text: Mrs Smith's kitchen is small.
trans: 史密斯太太的厨房很小

text: It is on the left.
trans: 它位于房间左侧

text: Come in, Amy.

trans: 我应该做些什么呢, 琼斯夫人?

speaker: Mrs. Jones
text: Open the window and air the room.
trans: 打开窗户, 给房间通通风

speaker: Mrs. Jones
text: Then put these clothes in the wardrobe.
trans: 然后把这些衣服放进衣橱里去

speaker: Mrs. Jones
text: Then make the bed.
trans: 再把床整理一下

speaker: Mrs. Jones
text: Dust the dressing table.
trans: 掸掉梳妆台上的灰尘

speaker: Mrs. Jones
text: Then sweep the floor.

speaker: Jack
text: She's in the garden, Jean.
trans: 她在花园, 琼

speaker: Jean
text: What's she doing?
trans: 她在干什么

speaker: Jack
text: She's sitting under the tree.
trans: 她正在树下坐着

speaker: Jean
text: Is Tim in the garden, too?
trans: 蒂姆也在花园里吗

speaker: Jack
text: Yes, he is. He's climbing the tree.
trans: 是的, 他也在花园里. 他正在爬树

speaker: Jean
text: I beg your pardon? Who's climbing the tree?
trans: 你说什么? 谁在爬树

speaker: Jack
text: Tim is.
trans: 蒂姆在爬树

speaker: Jean
text: What about the dog?
trans: 那么狗狗呢

speaker: Jack
text: The dog's in the garden, too.
trans: 狗狗也在花园里

speaker: Jack
text: It's running across the grass. It's running after a cat.
trans: 它正在草地上跑, 在追一只猫

text: It is a fine day today.
trans: 今天天气很好

text: There some clouds in the sky, but the sun is shining.
trans: 天空中飘着几朵云, 但阳光灿烂

text: Mr. Jones is with his family.
trans: 琼斯先生跟他的家人在一起

text: They are walking over the bridge.
trans: 他们正在过桥

text: There some boats on the river.
trans: 河里有几艘船

text: Mr. Jones and his wife are looking at them.
trans: 琼斯先生和他的妻子正在看这些船

text: Sally is looking at a big ship.
trans: 萨莉正在看一艘大船

text: The ship is going under the bridge.
trans: 那船正从桥下驶过

text: Tim is looking at an aeroplane.
trans: 蒂姆正望着一架飞机

text: The aeroplane is flying over the river.
trans: 飞机正从河上飞过

text: This is a photograph of our village.
trans: 这是我们村庄的一张照片

text: Our village is in a valley.
trans: 我们的村庄坐落在一个山谷之中

text: It is between two hills.
trans: 它位于两座小山之间

text: The village is on a river.
trans: 它靠近一条小河

text: Here is another photograph of the village.
trans: 这是我们村庄的另一张照片

text: My wife and I are walking along the banks of the river.
trans: 我和妻子正沿河岸走着

text: We are on the left.
trans: 我们在河的左侧

text: There is a boy in the water.
trans: 河里有个男孩

text: He is swimming across the river.
trans: 他在横渡小河

text: Here is another photograph.
trans: 这是另一张照片

text: This is the school building.
trans: 这是学校大楼

text: It is beside a park.
trans: 它位于公园旁边

text: The park is on the right.
trans: 公园在右侧

text: Some children are coming out of the building.
trans: 一些孩子正从大楼里出来

text: Some of them are going into the park.
trans: 他们中有几个正走进公园

speaker: Dan
text: You're working hard, George. What are you doing?
trans: 你干得真辛苦, 乔治. 你在做什么呢

speaker: George
text: I'm making a bookcase.
trans: 我正在做书架

speaker: George
text: Give me that hammer please, Dan.
trans: 请把那把锤子拿给我, 丹

speaker: Dan
text: Which hammer? This one?
trans: 哪一把? 是这把吗

speaker: George
text: No, not that one. The big one.
trans: 不, 不是那把. 是那把大的

speaker: Dan
text: Here you are.
trans: 给你

speaker: George
text: Thanks, Dan.
trans: 谢谢, 丹

speaker: Dan
text: What are you going to do now, George?
trans: 你现在打算做什么, 乔治

speaker: George
text: I'm going to paint it.
trans: 我打算给它上漆

speaker: Dan
text: What colour are you going to paint it?
trans: 你打算把它漆成什么颜色

speaker: George
text: I'm going to paint it pink.
trans: 我想漆成粉红色

speaker: Dan
text: Pink!
trans: 粉红色

speaker: George
text: This bookcase isn't for me. It's for my daughter Susan.
trans: 这个书架不是为我做的, 是为我的女儿苏珊做的

speaker: George
text: Pink's her favourite colour.
trans: 粉红色是她最喜欢的颜色

speaker: Sam
text: What are you going to do with that vase, Penny?
trans: 你打算如何处理那些花瓶

speaker: Penny
text: I'm going to put it on this table, Sam.
trans: 我打算把它放在这张桌子上, 萨姆

speaker: Sam
text: Don't do that. Give it to me.
trans: 不要放在那儿, 把它给我

speaker: Penny
text: What are you going to do with it?
trans: 你打算怎么办

speaker: Sam
text: I'm going to put it here, in front of the window.
trans: 我准备把它放在这儿, 放在窗前

speaker: Penny
text: Be careful! Don't drop it!
trans: 小心点, 别摔了

speaker: Penny
text: Don't put it there, Sam. Put it here, on this shelf.
trans: 别放在那儿, 萨姆. 放在这儿, 这个架子上

speaker: Sam
text: There we are! It's a lovely vase.
trans: 放好了. 这是只漂亮的花瓶

speaker: Penny
text: Those flowers are lovely, too.
trans: 那些花也很漂亮啊

speaker: Sam
text: Is that bag heavy, Penny?
trans: 那个提包重吗, 彭妮

speaker: Penny
text: Not very.
trans: 不太重

speaker: Sam
text: Here! Put it on this chair. What's in it?
trans: 放这儿. 把它放在这把椅子上. 里面是什么东西

speaker: Penny
text: A piece of cheese. A loaf of bread. A bar of soap. A bar of chocolate. A bottle of milk. A pound of sugar. Half a pound of coffee. A quarter of a pound of tea. And a tin of tobacco.
trans: 一块乳酪、一条面包、一块肥皂、一块巧克力、一瓶牛奶、一磅糖、半磅咖啡、1/4磅茶叶和一盒烟丝

speaker: Sam
text: Is that tin of tobacco for me?
trans: 那盒烟丝是给我的吗

speaker: Penny
text: Well, it's certainly not for me.
trans: 噢, 当然不会是给我的

speaker: Penny
text: Can you make the tea, Sam?
trans: 你会沏茶吗, 萨姆

speaker: Sam
text: Yes, of course I can, Penny.
trans: 会的, 我当然会, 彭妮

speaker: Sam
text: Is there any water in this kettle?
trans: 这水壶里有水吗

speaker: Penny
text: Yes, there is.
trans: 有水

speaker: Sam
text: Where's the tea?
trans: 茶叶在哪里

speaker: Penny
text: It's over there, behind the teapot.
trans: 就在那儿, 茶壶后面

speaker: Penny
text: Can you see it?
trans: 你看见了吗

speaker: Sam
text: I can see the teapot, but I can't see the tea.
trans: 茶壶我看见了, 但茶叶没看到

speaker: Penny
text: There it is! It's in front of you.
trans: 那不是吗, 就在你眼前

speaker: Sam
text: Ah yes, I can see it now.
trans: 噢, 是啊, 我现在看到了

speaker: Sam
text: Where are the cups?
trans: 茶杯在哪里

speaker: Penny
text: There are some in the cupboard.
trans: 碗橱里有几只

speaker: Penny
text: Can you find them?
trans: 你找得到吗

speaker: Sam
text: Yes. Here they are.
trans: 找得到, 就在这儿呢

speaker: Penny
text: Hurry up, Sam! The kettle's boiling!
trans: 快点, 萨姆, 水烧开了

speaker: The Boss
text: Can you come here a minute please, Bob?
trans: 请你来一下好吗, 鲍勃

speaker: Bob
text: Yes, sir?
trans: 什么事, 先生

speaker: The Boss
text: Where's Pamela?
trans: 帕梅拉在哪儿

speaker: Bob
text: She's next door. She's in her office, sir.
trans: 她在隔壁, 在她的办公室里, 先生

speaker: The Boss
text: Can she type this letter for me? Ask her please.
trans: 她能给我打一下这封信吗, 请问问她

speaker: Bob
text: Yes, sir.
trans: 好的, 先生

speaker: Bob
text: Can you type this letter for the boss please, Pamela?
trans: 你可以给老板打一下这封信吗, 帕梅拉

speaker: Pamela
text: Yes, of course I can.
trans: 可以, 当然可以

speaker: Bob
text: Here you are.
trans: 给你

speaker: Pamela
text: Thank you, Bob.
trans: 谢谢你, 鲍勃

speaker: Pamela
text: Bob!
trans: 鲍勃!

speaker: Bob
text: Yes? What's the matter?
trans: 怎么了? 怎么回事

speaker: Pamela
text: I can't type this letter.
trans: 我打不了这封信

speaker: Pamela
text: I can't read it! The boss's handwriting is terrible!
trans: 我看不懂这封信, 老板的字迹太糟糕了

speaker: Christine
text: Do you like coffee, Ann?
trans: 你喜欢咖啡吗, 安

speaker: Ann
text: Yes, I do.
trans: 是的, 我喜欢

speaker: Christine
text: Do you want a cup?
trans: 你想要来一杯吗

speaker: Ann
text: Yes, please, Christine.
trans: 好的, 请来一杯, 克里斯廷

speaker: Christine
text: Do you want any sugar?
trans: 你要放些糖吗

speaker: Ann
text: Yes, please.
trans: 好的, 请放一些

speaker: Christine
text: Do you want any milk?
trans: 要放些牛奶吗

speaker: Ann
text: No, thank you. I don't like milk in my coffee. I like black coffee.
trans: 不了, 谢谢. 我不喜欢在咖啡中放牛奶, 我喜欢清咖啡

speaker: Christine
text: Do you like biscuits.
trans: 你喜欢饼干吗

speaker: Ann
text: Yes, I do.
trans: 是的, 我喜欢

speaker: Christine
text: Do you want one?
trans: 你想要来一块吗

speaker: Ann
text: Yes, please.
trans: 好的, 请来一块

speaker: Butcher
text: Do you want any meat today, Mrs Bird?
trans: 您今天要买点肉吗, 伯德夫人

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: Yes, please.
trans: 是的, 我买一点

speaker: Butcher
text: Do you want beef or lamb?
trans: 您要牛肉还是要羔羊肉?

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: Beef, please.
trans: 请给我牛肉

speaker: Butcher
text: This lamb's very good.
trans: 这羔羊肉很好

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: I like lamb, but my husband doesn't.
trans: 我喜欢羔羊肉, 但我丈夫不喜欢

speaker: Butcher
text: What about some steak? This is a nice piece.
trans: 来点牛排吗, 这块很好

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: Give me that piece, please.
trans: 那就给我那块吧

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: And a pound of mince, too.
trans: 再来一磅肉馅

speaker: Butcher
text: Do you want a chicken, Mrs Bird? They're very nice.
trans: 您要买只鸡吗, 伯德夫人. 这些鸡很好

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: No, thank you.
trans: 不了, 谢谢

speaker: Mrs. Bird
text: My husband like steak, but he doesn't like chicken.
trans: 我丈夫喜欢牛排, 但他不喜欢鸡肉

speaker: Butcher
text: To tell you the truth, Mrs Bird, I don't like chicken either.
trans: 老实说, 我也不喜欢鸡肉

speaker: Hans
text: Where do you come from?
trans: 你是哪国人

speaker: Dimitri
text: I come from Greece.
trans: 我是希腊人

speaker: Hans
text: What's the climate like in your country?
trans: 你们国家的气候怎么样

speaker: Dimitri
text: It's very pleasant.
trans: 气候非常宜人

speaker: Hans
text: What's the weather like in spring?
trans: 春天的天气怎么样

speaker: Dimitri
text: It's often windy in March. It's always warm in April and May, but it rains sometimes.
trans: 3月里常常刮风. 4月和5月的天气总是暖洋洋的, 但有时下雨

speaker: Hans
text: What's it like in summer?
trans: 夏季的天气怎么样

speaker: Dimitri
text: It's always hot in June, July and August. The sun shines every day.
trans: 6月、7月和8月的天气总是炎热的, 每天都出太阳

speaker: Hans
text: Is it cold or warm in autumn?
trans: 秋季的天气是冷还是暖的呢

speaker: Dimitri
text: It's always warm in September and October. It's often cold in November and it rains sometimes.
trans: 9月和10月总是很暖和, 11月常常很冷, 而且有时下雨

speaker: Hans
text: Is it very cold in winter?
trans: 冬季的天气很冷吗

speaker: Dimitri
text: It's often cold in December, January and February. It snows sometimes.
trans: 12月、1月和2月常常很冷, 有时还下雪

speaker: Hans
text: Where do you come from?
trans: 你是哪国人

speaker: Jim
text: I come from England.
trans: 我是英国人

speaker: Hans
text: What's the climate like in your country?
trans: 你们国家的气候怎么样

speaker: Jim
text: It's mild, but it's not always pleasant.
trans: 气候温和, 但也不总是宜人的

speaker: Jim
text: The weather's often cold in the North and windy in the East.
trans: 北部的天气常常寒冷, 东部则常常刮风

speaker: Jim
text: It's often wet in the West and sometimes warm in the South.
trans: 西部常下雨, 南部有时则很暖和

speaker: Hans
text: Which seasons do you like best?
trans: 你最喜欢哪些季节

speaker: Jim
text: I like spring and summer. The days are long and the nights are short. The sun rises early and sets late.
trans: 我最喜欢春季和夏季. 因为此时白天长而夜晚短, 太阳升得早而落得晚

speaker: Jim
text: I don't like autumn and winter. The days are short and the nights are long. The sun rises late and sets early.
trans: 我不喜欢秋季和冬季. 因为此时白天短而夜晚长, 太阳升得迟而落得早

speaker: Jim
text: Our climate is not very good, but it's certainly interesting. It's our favourite subject of conversation.
trans: 虽然我们国家的气候并不很好, 但确实很有意思. 天气是我们最喜欢谈论的话题

text: The Sawyers live at 87 King Street.
trans: 索耶一家住在国王街87号

text: In the morning, Mr Sawyer goes to work and the children go to school. Their father takes them to school every day.
trans: 早上, 索耶先生去上班, 孩子们去上学. 父亲每天送孩子们去上学

text: Mrs Sawyer stays at home every day. She does the housework.
trans: 索耶夫人每天呆在家里. 她料理家务

text: She always eats her lunch at noon.
trans: 她总是在正午吃午饭

text: In the afternoon, she usually sees her friends. They often drink tea together.
trans: 下午, 她总是会见她的朋友. 她们经常在一起喝茶

text: In the evening, the children come home from school. They arrive home early.
trans: 傍晚, 孩子们放学回家, 他们到家很早

text: Mr Sawyer comes home from work. He arrives home late.
trans: 索耶先生下班回家, 他到家很晚

text: At night, the children always do their homework. Then they go to bed. Mr Sawyer usually reads his newspaper, but sometimes he and his wife watch television.
trans: 晚上, 孩子们总是做作业, 然后去睡觉. 索耶先生总是读报纸, 但有时和他的妻子一起看电视

text: It is eight o'clock. The children go to school by car every day, but today, they are going to school on foot.
trans: 现在时8点钟. 孩子们每天都乘小汽车去上学, 而今天, 他们正步行去上学

text: It is ten o'clock. Mrs Sawyer usually stays at home in the morning, but this morning, she is going to the shops.
trans: 现在时10点钟. 上午, 索耶夫人通常是呆在家里, 但今天上午, 她正去商店买东西

text: It is four o'clock. In the afternoon, Mrs Sawyer usually drink tea in the living room. But this afternoon, she is drinking tea in the garden.
trans: 现在时4点钟. 下午, 索耶夫人通常是在客厅里喝茶, 但今天下午, 她正在花园里喝茶

text: It is six o'clock. In the evening, the children usually do their homework, but this evening, they are not doing their homework. At the moment, they are playing in the garden.
trans: 现在时6点钟. 傍晚, 孩子们通常是做作业, 而今天傍晚, 他们没做作业. 此刻, 他们正在花园里玩

text: It is nine o'clock. Mr Sawyer usually reads his newspaper at night. But he's not reading his newspaper tonight. At the moment, he's reading an interesting book.
trans: 现在时9点钟. 索耶先生通常是在晚上看报纸, 但今天晚上他没有看. 此刻, 他正在看一遍有趣的书

speaker: Lady
text: I want some envelopes, please.
trans: 请给我拿几个信封

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: Do you want the large size or the small size?
trans: 您要大号的还是小号的

speaker: Lady
text: The large size, please.
trans: 请拿大号的

speaker: Lady
text: Do you have any writing paper?
trans: 您有信纸

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: Yes, we do.
trans: 有

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: I don't have any small pads. I only have large ones. Do you want a pad?
trans: 我没有小本的信纸, 只有大本的. 您要一本吗

speaker: Lady
text: Yes, please. And I want some glue.
trans: 好, 请拿一本. 我还要些胶水

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: A bottle of glue.
trans: 一瓶胶水

speaker: Lady
text: And I want a large box of chalk, too.
trans: 我还要一大盒粉笔

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: I only have small boxes. Do you want one?
trans: 我只有小盒的. 您要一盒吗

speaker: Lady
text: No, thank you.
trans: 不了, 谢谢

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: Is that all?
trans: 就要这些吗

speaker: Lady
text: That's all, thank you
trans: 就这些, 谢谢

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: What else do you want?
trans: 您还要什么吗

speaker: Lady
text: I want my change.
trans: 我要找的零钱

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: Where's Jimmy?
trans: 吉米在哪里

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: He's in bed.
trans: 他躺在床上

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: What's the matter with him?
trans: 他怎么啦

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: He feels ill.
trans: 他觉得不舒服

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: He looks ill.
trans: 他看上去是病了

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: We must call the doctor.
trans: 我们得去请医生

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: Yes, we must.
trans: 是的, 一定得请

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: Can you remember the doctor's telephone number?
trans: 你还记得医生的电话号码吗

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Yes, It's 09754.

speaker: Doctor
text: Open your mouth, Jimmy. Show me your tongue. Say, 'Ah'.
trans: 把嘴张开, 吉米. 让我看看你的舌头. 说 '啊'

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: What's the matter with him, doctor?
trans: 他得了什么病, 医生

speaker: Doctor
text: He has a bad cold, Mr Williams, so he must stay in bed for a week.
trans: 他得了重感冒, 威廉斯先生, 因此他必须卧床一周

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: That's good news for Jimmy.
trans: 对吉米来说, 这可是个好消息

speaker: Doctor
text: Good news? Why?
trans: 好消息? 为什么

speaker: Mr. Williams
text: Because he doesn't like school.
trans: 因为他不喜欢上学

speaker: Doctor
text: How's Jimmy today?
trans: 吉米今天怎么样了

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Better. Thank you, doctor.
trans: 他好些了, 谢谢您, 医生

speaker: Doctor
text: Can I see him please, Mrs Williams.
trans: 我可以看看他吗, 威廉斯夫人

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Certainly, doctor. Come upstairs.
trans: 当然可以, 医生, 上楼吧

speaker: Doctor
text: You look very well, Jimmy. You are better now, but you mustn't get up yet. You must stay in bed for another two days.
trans: 你看上去很好, 吉米. 你现在好些了, 但你还不应该起床, 你必须再卧床两天

speaker: Doctor
text: The boy mustn't go to school yet, Mrs Williams. And he mustn't eat rich food.
trans: 这孩子还不能去上学, 威廉斯夫人, 而且不能吃油腻的食物

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Does he have a temperature, doctor?
trans: 他还发烧吗, 医生

speaker: Doctor
text: No, he doesn't.
trans: 不, 他不发烧了

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Must he stay in bed?
trans: 他还必须卧床吗

speaker: Doctor
text: Yes. He must remain in bed for another two days. He can get up for about two hours each day, but you must keep the room warm.
trans: 是的, 他还必须卧床两天. 他每天可以起来两个小时, 但您必须保持房间温暖

speaker: Doctor
text: Where's Mr Williams this evening?
trans: 威廉斯先生今晚去哪儿了

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: He's in bed, doctor. Can you see him please? He has a bad cold, too.
trans: 他在床上呢, 医生. 您能看看他吗, 他也得了重感冒

speaker: Father
text: What are you going to do this evening, Jill?
trans: 你今晚打算做什么, 吉尔

speaker: Jill
text: I'm going to meet some friends, Dad.
trans: 我打算去见几个朋友, 爸爸

speaker: Father
text: You mustn't come home late. You must be home at half past ten.
trans: 你不准回家太晚, 你必须在10点半到家

speaker: Jill
text: I can't get home so early, Dad.
trans: 这么早我到不了家, 爸爸

speaker: Jill
text: Can I have the key to the front door, please?
trans: 我能带上前门的钥匙吗

speaker: Father
text: No, you can't.
trans: 不行, 你不能带

speaker: Mother
text: Jill's eighteen years old, Tom. She's not a baby. Give her the key. She always come home early.
trans: 吉尔都18岁了, 汤姆. 她不是小孩子了. 把钥匙给她吧. 她总是早早回家的

speaker: Father
text: Oh, all right!
trans: 那么, 好吧

speaker: Father
text: Here you are. But you mustn't come home after a quarter past eleven. Do you hear?
trans: 拿去. 但你不能超过11点1刻回家. 听见了吗

speaker: Jill
text: Yes, Dad.
trans: 听见了, 爸爸

speaker: Jill
text: Thanks, Mum.
trans: 谢谢, 妈妈

speaker: Mother
text: That's all right. Goodbye. Enjoy yourself!
trans: 不用谢. 再见, 好好玩吧

speaker: Jill
text: We always enjoy ourselves, Mum. Bye-bye
trans: 我们总是玩得很开心, 妈妈, 再见

speaker: Mrs. Johnson
text: Hello. Were you at the butcher's?
trans: 您好, 刚才您在肉店里吗

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Yes, I was. Were you at the butcher's, too?
trans: 是的, 我在肉店里. 你也在肉店里吗

speaker: Mrs. Johnson
text: No, I wasn't. I was at the greengrocer's. How's Jimmy today?
trans: 不, 我不在. 我刚才在蔬菜水果店里. 吉米今天怎么样

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: He's very well, thank you.
trans: 他很好, 谢谢您

speaker: Mrs. Johnson
text: Was he absent from school last week?
trans: 上个星期他没上学吧

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Yes, he was. He was absent On Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. How are you all keeping?
trans: 是的, 他没上学. 他周一, 周二, 周三和周四没去上学. 你们身体都好吗

speaker: Mrs. Johnson
text: Very well, thank you. We're going to spend three days in the country. We're going to stay at my mother's for the weekend.
trans: 很好, 谢谢您. 我们打算到乡下去三天, 在我母亲家度过周末

speaker: Mrs. Williams
text: Friday, Saturday and Sunday in the country! Aren't you lucky.
trans: 周五, 周六和周日在乡下过. 这也太爽了吧

text: There is a car race near our town every year. In 1995, there was a very big race.
trans: 在我们镇子附近每年都有一场汽车比赛. 1995年举行了一次盛大的比赛

text: There were hundreds of people there. My wife and I were at the race. Our friends Julie and Jack were there, too. You can see us in the crowd. We are standing on the left.
trans: 许多的人都去了赛场. 我和我妻子也去了. 我们的朋友朱莉和杰克也去了. 你可以在人群中看到我们. 我们站在左边

text: There were twenty cars in the race. There were English cars, French cars, German cars, Italian cars, American cars and Japanese cars.
trans: 有20辆汽车参加比赛. 有英国、法国、德国、意大利、美国和日本的汽车

text: It was an exciting finish. The winner was Billy Stewart. He was in car number fifteen. Five other cars were just behind him.
trans: 比赛的结尾是激动人心的. 冠军是比利•斯图尔特. 他在第15号车里, 其他5辆汽车紧随其后

text: On the way home, my wife said to me, 'Don't drive so quickly! You're not Billy Stewart!'
trans: 在回家的途中, 我妻子对我说: '别开得那么快! 你可不是比利•斯图尔特!'

speaker: Jane
text: What's Ron Marston like, Pauline?
trans: 波琳, 郎•马斯顿是个什么样的人?

speaker: Pauline
text: He's awful! He telephoned me four times yesterday, and three times the day before yesterday.
trans: 他讨厌透了, 他昨天给我打了4次电话, 前天打了3次

speaker: Pauline
text: He telephoned the office yesterday morning and yesterday afternoon. My boss answered the telephone.
trans: 他昨天上午和下午把电话打到了我的办公室, 是我的老板接的

speaker: Jane
text: What did your boss say to him?
trans: 你老板说怎么对他说的

speaker: Pauline
text: He said, 'Pauline is typing letters. She can't speak to you now!'
trans: 他说: 波琳正在打信, 她现在不能给你回话

speaker: Pauline
text: Then I arrived home at six o'clock yesterday evening. He telephoned again. But I didn't answered the phone!
trans: 后来, 我昨晚6点回到家, 他又打来电话, 但我没接

speaker: Jane
text: Did he telephone again last night?
trans: 他昨天夜里又打电话了吗

speaker: Pauline
text: Yes, he did. He telephoned at nine o'clock.
trans: 是的, 打了. 他在9点钟又打来了电话

speaker: Jane
text: What did you say to him?
trans: 你是怎么回他的

speaker: Pauline
text: I said, 'This is Pauline's monther. Please don't telephone my daughter again!'
trans: 我说: 我是波琳的母亲, 请不要再给我女儿打电话了

speaker: Jane
text: Did he telephone again?
trans: 他又打了没有

speaker: Pauline
text: No, he didn't!
trans: 没有

text: Last week Mrs Mills went to London. She does know London very well, and she lost her way.
trans: 上周米尔斯夫人去了伦敦. 她对伦敦不是很熟悉, 因此迷路了

text: Suddenly, she saw a man near a bus stop. 'I can ask him the way,' she said to herself.
trans: 突然, 她在公车站附近看到了一个男人. '我可以向他问路.' 她心里嘀咕着

text: 'Excuse me,' she said. 'Can you help me the way to King Street, please?'
trans: '对不起, 您能告诉我到国王街怎么走吗.' 她说道

text: The man smiled pleasantly. He did not understand English! He spoke German. He was a tourist.
trans: 这人友好地笑了笑. 他不懂英语, 他讲德语, 他是个游客

text: Then he put his hand into his pocket, and took out a phrasebook.
trans: 然后他把手伸进了口袋, 掏出了一本常用语手册

text: He opened the book and found a phrase. He read the phrase slowly. 'I am sorry,' he said. 'I do not speak English.'
trans: 他翻开书找到了一条短语. 他缓慢地读着短语. '很抱歉' 他说道, '我不会讲英语'

speaker: Lady
text: Do you have any shoes like these?
trans: 像这样的鞋子你们有吗

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: What size?
trans: 什么尺码的

speaker: Lady
text: Size five.
trans: 5号的

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: What colour?
trans: 什么颜色

speaker: Lady
text: Black.
trans: 黑色

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: I'm sorry. We don't have any.
trans: 对不起, 我们没有

speaker: Lady
text: But my sister bought this pair last month.
trans: 但是, 我姐姐上个月买到了这样的一双

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: Did she buy them here?
trans: 她是在这儿买的吗

speaker: Lady
text: No, she bought them in the U.S.
trans: 不, 她是在美国买的

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: We had some shoes like those a mouth ago, but we don't have any now.
trans: 一个月前我们有这样的鞋, 但是现在没有了

speaker: Lady
text: Can you get a pair of for me, please?
trans: 您能为我找一双吗

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: I'm afraid that I can't. They were in fashion last year and the year before last. But they're not in fashion this year.
trans: 恐怕不行, 这鞋在去年和前年流行, 而今年已经不流行了

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: These shoes are in fashion now.
trans: 现在流行的是这种鞋子

speaker: Lady
text: They look very uncomfortable.
trans: 这种鞋子看上去很不舒服

speaker: Shop Assistant
text: They are very uncomfortable. But women always wear uncomfortable shoes!
trans: 的确很不舒服, 可是女人们总是穿不舒服的鞋子

speaker: Nurse
text: Good morning. Mr. Croft
trans: 早上好, 克罗夫特先生

speaker: Mr. Croft
text: Good morning, nurse. I want to see the dentist, please.
trans: 早上好, 护士. 我想见牙科医生

speaker: Nurse
text: Do you have an appointment?
trans: 你有预约吗

speaker: Mr. Croft
text: No, I don't.
trans: 没有

speaker: Nurse
text: Is it urgent?
trans: 很急吗

speaker: Mr. Croft
text: Yes, it is. It's very urgent. I feel awful. I have a terrible toothache.
trans: 是的, 很急. 我难受死了, 牙痛得要命

speaker: Nurse
text: Can you come at 10AM on Monday, April 24th?
trans: 您在4月24日星期一上午10点钟来可以吗

speaker: Mr. Croft
text: I must see the dentist now, nurse.
trans: 我必须现在就见牙科医生, 护士

speaker: Nurse
text: The dentist is very busy at the moment. Can you come at 2PM?
trans: 牙科医生这会儿很忙, 您下午两点钟来行吗

speaker: Mr. Croft
text: That's very late. Can the dentist see me now?
trans: 那就太晚了. 牙科医生现在能给我看一下吗

speaker: Nurse
text: I'm afraid that he can't, Mr. Croft. Can't you wait until this afternoon?
trans: 恐怕不行, 克罗夫特先生. 您就不能等到今天下午吗

speaker: Mr. Croft
text: I can wait, but my toothache can't!
trans: 我倒是可以等, 但是我的牙痛等不了啊

speaker: Tom
text: What are you doing, Carol?
trans: 卡罗尔, 你在做什么呢

speaker: Carol
text: I'm making a shopping list, Tom.
trans: 我在写购物清单, 汤姆

speaker: Tom
text: What do we need?
trans: 我们都需要些什么

speaker: Carol
text: We need a lot of things this week.
trans: 这个星期我们需要很多东西

speaker: Carol
text: I must go the grocer's. We haven't got much tea or coffee, and we haven't got any sugar or jam.
trans: 我得去一下食品店. 我们的茶叶和咖啡不多了, 糖和果酱也没有了

speaker: Tom
text: What about vegetables?
trans: 蔬菜呢

speaker: Carol
text: I must go to the greengrocer's. We haven't got many tomatoes, but we've got a lot of potatoes.
trans: 我还要到蔬菜水果店去一下. 我们的番茄不多了, 但土豆还有不少

speaker: Carol
text: I must go to the butcher's, too. We need some meat. We haven't got any meat at all.
trans: 我还要到肉店去一下. 我们需要一些肉. 我们一点肉都没有了

speaker: Tom
text: Have we got any beer and wine?
trans: 我们还有啤酒和葡萄酒吗

speaker: Carol
text: No, we haven't. And I'm not going to get any.
trans: 没有了, 不过我不打算去买

speaker: Tom
text: I hope that you've got some money.
trans: 我希望你还有钱

speaker: Carol
text: I haven't got much.
trans: 我的钱不多了

speaker: Tom
text: Well, I haven't got much either!
trans: 唉, 我的也不多了

speaker: Sam
text: Hi, Carol! Where's Tom?
trans: 你好, 卡罗尔. 汤姆在哪

speaker: Carol
text: He's upstairs. He's having a bath.
trans: 他在楼上, 他正在洗澡

speaker: Carol
text: Tom!
trans: 汤姆!

speaker: Tom
text: Yes?
trans: 什么事?

speaker: Carol
text: Sam's here.
trans: 萨姆来了

speaker: Tom
text: I'm nearly ready.
trans: 我马上就好

speaker: Tom
text: Hello, Sam. Have a cigarette.
trans: 你好, 萨姆. 来抽根烟

speaker: Sam
text: No, thanks, Tom.
trans: 不了, 谢谢, 汤姆

speaker: Tom
text: Have a glass of whisky then.
trans: 那么来一杯威士忌吧

speaker: Sam
text: OK, Thanks.
trans: 好的, 谢谢

speaker: Tom
text: Is dinner ready, Carol?
trans: 卡罗尔, 晚饭好了吗

speaker: Carol
text: It's nearly ready. We can have dinner at seven o'clock.
trans: 马上就好. 7点钟时我们就可以吃饭了

speaker: Tom
text: Sam and I had lunch together today. We went to a restaurant.
trans: 我和萨姆今天一起吃的午饭. 我们去了一家饭馆

speaker: Carol
text: What did you have?
trans: 你们吃了什么

speaker: Tom
text: We had roast beef and potatoes.
trans: 我们吃了烤牛肉和土豆

speaker: Carol
text: Oh!
trans: 噢

speaker: Tom
text: What's the matter, Carol?
trans: 怎么了, 卡罗尔

speaker: Carol
text: Well, you're going to have roast beef and potatoes again tonight!
trans: 唉, 今晚你们又要吃一次烤牛肉和土豆了

speaker: Carol
text: Hello, Sam. Come in.
trans: 你好, 萨姆. 进来吧

speaker: Tom
text: Hi, Sam. We're having lunch. Do you want to have lunch with us?
trans: 你好, 萨姆. 我们正在吃午饭, 你要来跟我们一起吃吗

speaker: Sam
text: No, thank you, Tom. I've already had lunch. I had lunch at half past twelve.
trans: 不了, 汤姆, 谢谢. 我已经吃过午饭了. 我在12点半时吃的

speaker: Carol
text: Have a cup of coffee then?
trans: 那么来一杯咖啡吧

speaker: Sam
text: I've just had a cup, thank you. I had one after my lunch.
trans: 我刚喝了一杯, 谢谢. 我是在饭后喝的

speaker: Tom
text: Let's go into the living room, Carol. We can have our coffee there.
trans: 我们到客厅里去吧, 卡罗尔. 我们可以在那里喝咖啡

speaker: Carol
text: Excuse the mess, Sam. This room's very untidy. We're packing our suitcases. We're going to leave tomorrow. Tom and I are going to have a holiday.
trans: 抱歉, 屋子很乱. 房间里乱七八糟的. 我们正在收拾行李箱. 明天我们就要走了. 我和汤姆准备去度假

speaker: Sam
text: Aren't you lucky!
trans: 你们真幸运啊

speaker: Tom
text: When are you going to have a holiday, Sam?
trans: 萨姆, 你准备什么时候去度假

speaker: Sam
text: I don't know. I've already had my holiday this year.
trans: 不知道, 今年我已经度过假了

speaker: Carol
text: Where did you go?
trans: 你去了哪里

speaker: Sam
text: I stayed at home!
trans: 我呆在家里了

speaker: George
text: Hello, Ken.
trans: 你好, 肯

speaker: Ken
text: Hi, George.
trans: 你好, 乔治

speaker: George
text: Have you just been to the cinema?
trans: 你刚才去过电影院了吗

speaker: Ken
text: Yes, I have.
trans: 是的, 我刚去过

speaker: George
text: What's on?
trans: 上映什么片子?

speaker: Ken
text: Paris in the Spring
trans: 《巴黎之春》

speaker: George
text: Oh, I've already seen it. I saw it on television last year. It's an old film, but it's very good.
trans: 噢, 我已经看过了. 我是去年在电视上看的. 这是部老电影, 但很好

speaker: Ken
text: Paris is a beautiful city.
trans: 巴黎是座美丽的城市

speaker: George
text: I've never been there. Have you ever been there, Ken?
trans: 我从未去过那里. 肯, 你去过吗

speaker: Ken
text: Yes, I have. I was there in April.
trans: 是的, 我去过, 4月份时我在那里

speaker: George
text: Paris in the Spring, eh?
trans: 那是巴黎之春, 是吗

speaker: Ken
text: It was spring, but the weather was awful. It rained all the time.
trans: 是春天, 但天气太糟了. 一直在下雨

speaker: George
text: Just like London!
trans: 就像伦敦一样

speaker: Mr. Wood
text: Is my car ready yet?
trans: 我的汽车修好了吗

speaker: Attendant
text: I don't know, sir. What's the number of your car?
trans: 我不知道, 先生. 您的汽车牌号是多少

speaker: Mr. Wood
text: It's LFZ 312 G.
trans: 是 LFZ312G

speaker: Attendant
text: When did you bring it to us?
trans: 您是什么时候送来的

speaker: Mr. Wood
text: I brought it here three days ago.
trans: 3天前

speaker: Attendant
text: Ah yes, I remember now.
trans: 啊, 是的, 我现在记起来了

speaker: Mr. Wood
text: Have your mechanics finished yet?
trans: 你们的机械师修好了吗

speaker: Attendant
text: No, they're still working on it. Let's go into the garage and have a look at it.
trans: 没有, 他们还在修呢. 我们到车库去看一下吧

speaker: Attendant
text: Is that your car?
trans: 那不是您的车吗

speaker: Mr. Wood
text: Well, it was my car.
trans: 唔, 曾经是

speaker: Attendant
text: Didn't you have a crash?
trans: 您不是出车祸了吧

speaker: Mr. Wood
text: That's right. I drove it into a lamp-post. Can your mechanics repair it?
trans: 是啊, 我把车怼到路灯柱上了. 你们的机械师能修好吗

speaker: Attendant
text: Well, they're trying to repair it, sir. But to tell you the truth, you need a new car!
trans: 啊, 他们正设法修呢, 先生. 不过说实在的, 您需要一辆新车了

speaker: Nigel
text: Good afternoon. I believe that this house is for sale.
trans: 下午好, 我想这房子是要出售的吧

speaker: Ian
text: That's right.
trans: 是的

speaker: Nigel
text: May I have a look at it, please?
trans: 我可以看一看吗

speaker: Ian
text: Yes, of course. Come in.
trans: 可以, 当然可以, 请进

speaker: Nigel
text: How long have you lived here?
trans: 您在这里住了多长时间

speaker: Ian
text: I've lived here for twenty years.
trans: 我在这里已经住了20年了

speaker: Nigel
text: Twenty years! That's a long time.
trans: 20年, 这个时间可不短

speaker: Ian
text: Yes, I've been here since 1976.
trans: 是啊, 从1976年起我就住在这里了

speaker: Nigel
text: Then why do you want to sell it?
trans: 那么, 您为什么要卖掉它呢

speaker: Ian
text: Because I've just retired. I want to buy a small house in the country.
trans: 因为我刚退休, 我想在乡下买幢小房子

speaker: Nigel
text: How much does this house cost?
trans: 这座房子卖多少钱

speaker: Nigel
text: That's a lot of money!
trans: 那可真是一笔大钱呢

speaker: Ian
text: It's worth every penny of it.
trans: 它确确实实值这么多钱

speaker: Nigel
text: Well, I like the house, but I can't decide yet. My wife must see it first.
trans: 啊, 我喜欢这房子, 但我还不能做决定. 我妻子必须先来看一看

speaker: Ian
text: Woman always have the last word.
trans: 女人总是最后说了算

speaker: Catherine
text: Has Ian sold his house yet?
trans: 伊恩已经把他的房子卖掉了吗

speaker: Jenny
text: Yes, he has. He sold it was last week.
trans: 是的, 卖掉了. 他上星期卖掉的

speaker: Catherine
text: Has he moved to his new house yet?
trans: 他已经迁进新居了吗

speaker: Jenny
text: No, not yet. He's still here. He's going to move tomorrow.
trans: 还没有. 他仍在这里. 他打算明天搬家

speaker: Catherine
text: When? Tomorrow morning?
trans: 什么时候, 明天上午吗

speaker: Jenny
text: No. Tomorrow afternoon. I'll miss him. He has always been a good neighbour.
trans: 不, 明天下午. 我会想念他的. 他一直是个好邻居

speaker: Linda
text: He's a very nice person. We'll all miss him.
trans: 他是个非常好的人, 我们大家都会想念他的

speaker: Catherine
text: When will the new people move into this hosue?
trans: 新住户什么时候搬进这座房子?

speaker: Jenny
text: I think that they'll move in the day after tomorrow.
trans: 我觉得他们会在后台搬进来吧

speaker: Linda
text: Will you see Ian today, Jenny?
trans: 詹尼, 你今天会见到伊恩吗

speaker: Jenny
text: Yes, I will.
trans: 是的, 我会见到他

speaker: Linda
text: Please give him my regards.
trans: 请代我问候他

speaker: Catherine
text: Poor Ian! He didn't want to leave this house.
trans: 可怜的伊恩, 他原本不想离开这幢房子的

speaker: Jenny
text: No, he didn't want to leave, but his wife did!
trans: 是啊, 他是不想离开, 但是他妻子要离开

text: Nigel is our new next-door neighbour. He's a pilot.
trans: 奈杰尔是我们新搬来的隔壁邻居. 他是个飞行员

text: He was in the R.A.F.
trans: 他曾在皇家空军任职

text: He will fly to New York next month.
trans: 下个月他将飞往纽约

text: The month after next he'll fly to Tokyo.
trans: 再下个月他将飞往东京

text: At the moment, he's in Madrid. He flew to Spain a week ago.
trans: 现在他在马德里, 他是一个星期前飞到西班牙的

text: He'll return to London the week after next.
trans: 再下个星期他将返回伦敦

text: He's only forty-one years old, and he has already been to nearly every country in the world.
trans: 他只有41岁, 但他却去过世界上几乎每一个国家

text: Nigel is a very lucky man. But his wife isn't very lucky. She usually stays at home!
trans: 奈杰尔是个很幸运的人. 但他妻子就不那么好运了, 她总是呆在家里

speaker: George
text: Two return tickets to London, please. What time will the next train leave?
trans: 买两张到伦敦的往返票. 下一班火车什么时候开

speaker: Attendant
text: At nineteen minutes past eight.
trans: 8点19分

speaker: George
text: Which platform?
trans: 在哪个站台

speaker: Attendant
text: Platform Two. Over the bridge.
trans: 2号站台, 过天桥

speaker: Ken
text: What time will the next train leave?
trans: 下一班火车什么时候开

speaker: George
text: At eight nineteen.
trans: 8点19分

speaker: Ken
text: We're got plenty of time.
trans: 我们的时间还很宽裕

speaker: George
text: It's only three minutes to eight.
trans: 现在才7点57分

speaker: Ken
text: Let's go and have a drink. There's a bar next door to the station.
trans: 我们去喝点东西吧, 车站旁边有个酒吧

speaker: George
text: We had better go back to the station now, Ken.
trans: 肯, 我们现在最好回到车站去

speaker: Popter
text: Tickets, please.
trans: 请出示车票

speaker: George
text: We want to catch the eight nineteen to London.
trans: 我们要乘8点19分的车去伦敦

speaker: Popter
text: You're just missed it!
trans: 你们刚好错过了那班车

speaker: George
text: What! It's only eight fifteen.
trans: 什么! 现在才8点15分而已

speaker: Popter
text: I'm sorry, sir. That clock's ten minutes slow.
trans: 对不起, 先生. 那个钟慢了10分钟

speaker: George
text: When's the next train?
trans: 下一班火车是什么时候

speaker: Popter
text: In five hours' time!
trans: 5个小时以后

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: I left a suitcase on the train to London the other day.
trans: 几天前我把一个手提箱落在开往伦敦的火车上了

speaker: Attendant
text: Can you describe it, sir?
trans: 先生, 您能描述一下它是什么样子的吗

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: It's a small blue case and it's got a zip. There's a label on the handle with my name and address on it.
trans: 是个蓝色的小箱子, 上面有拉链. 箱把上有个标签, 上面写着我的姓名和住址

speaker: Attendant
text: Is this case yours?
trans: 这箱子是您的吗

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: No, that's not mine.
trans: 不, 那不是我的

speaker: Attendant
text: What about this one? This one's got a lable.
trans: 这个是不是? 这个箱子有个标签

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: Let me see it.
trans: 让我看看

speaker: Attendant
text: What's your name and address?
trans: 您的姓名和住址是什么

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: David Hall, 83, Bridge Street.
trans: 大卫•霍尔, 大桥街83号

speaker: Attendant
text: That's right. D.N. Hall, 83, Bridge Street.
trans: 那就对了, D.N 霍尔, 大桥街83号

speaker: Attendant
text: Three pounds fifty pence, please.
trans: 请付3英镑50便士

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: Here you are.
trans: 给您

speaker: Attendant
text: Thank you.
trans: 谢谢您

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: Hey!
trans: 嗨

speaker: Attendant
text: What's the matter?
trans: 怎么回事

speaker: Mr. Hall
text: This case doesn't belong to me! You've given me the wrong case!
trans: 这箱子不是我的, 您给错了

speaker: Andy
text: Ow!
trans: 哎哟

speaker: Lucy
text: What's the matter, Andy?
trans: 怎么了, 安迪

speaker: Andy
text: I slipped and fell downstairs.
trans: 我滑了一跤, 从楼梯上摔下来了

speaker: Lucy
text: Have you hurt yourself?
trans: 你摔伤了没有

speaker: Andy
text: Yes, I have. I think that I've hurt my back.
trans: 是啊, 摔伤了. 我觉得我伤到背了

speaker: Lucy
text: Try and stand up. Can you stand up? Here. Let me help you.
trans: 试试站起来. 你能站起来吗. 让我帮你

speaker: Andy
text: I'm sorry, Lucy. I'm afraid that I can't get up.
trans: 抱歉, 露西, 恐怕我站不起来

speaker: Lucy
text: I think that the doctor had better see you. I'll phone Dr. Carter.
trans: 我觉得最好请医生来给你看一下. 我去给卡特医生打电话

speaker: Lucy
text: The doctor says that he will come at once. I'm sure that you need an X-ray, Andy.
trans: 医生说他马上就来. 安迪, 我看你需要做一次X光透视

speaker: Grandmother
text: Read Jimmy's card to me please, Penny.
trans: 请把吉米的明信片念给听听, 彭妮

speaker: Penny
text: I have just arrived in Scotland and I'm staying at a Youth Hostel.
trans: 我刚到苏格兰, 我现在住在一家青年招待所

speaker: Grandmother
text: Eh?
trans: 什么

speaker: Penny
text: He says he's just arrived in Scotland. He says he's staying at a Youth Hostel. You know he's a member of the Y.H.A.
trans: 他说他刚到苏格兰. 他说他现在住在一家青年招待所. 您知道, 他是Y.H.A的成员

speaker: Grandmother
text: The what?
trans: 什么

speaker: Penny
text: The Y.H.A, Mum. The Youth Hostels Association.
trans: Y.H.A, 妈妈. 青年招待所协会

speaker: Grandmother
text: What else does he say?
trans: 他还说了些什么

speaker: Penny
text: 'I'll write a letter soon. I hope you are all well.'
trans: '我很快会写信的, 祝你们大家身体都好'

speaker: Grandmother
text: What? Speak up, Penny. I'm afraid I can't hear you.
trans: 什么? 彭妮, 大声一点. 我可听不见你念的

speaker: Penny
text: He says he'll write a letter soon. He hopes we are all well. 'Love, Jimmy.'
trans: 他说他很快会写信的. 他祝我们大家身体好. '爱你们的吉米'

speaker: Grandmother
text: Is that all? He doesn't say very much, does he?
trans: 就这些吗. 他没写多少, 是吗

speaker: Penny
text: He can't write very much on a card, Mum.
trans: 在明信片上他写不了很多, 妈妈

speaker: Gray
text: How was the exam, Richard?
trans: 考试考得怎么样, 理查德

speaker: Richard
text: Not too bad. I think I passed in English and Mathematics. The questions were very easy. How about you, Gary?
trans: 不算太烂, 我想我的英语和数学及格了. 题目很容易. 加里, 你怎么样

speaker: Gray
text: The English and Maths papers weren't easy enough for me. I hope I haven't failed.
trans: 英语和数学试题对我来说不那么容易. 我希望别不及格

speaker: Richard
text: I think I failed the French paper. I could answer sixteen of the questions. They were very easy. But I couldn't answer the rest. They were too difficult for me.
trans: 我觉得我的法语要不及格了, 我能回答其中的16道题, 这些题很容易. 但我回答不出其余的题, 那些题对我来说太难了

speaker: Gray
text: French tests are awful, aren't they?
trans: 法语考试太可怕了, 你说呢

speaker: Richard
text: I hate them. I'm sure I've got a low mark.
trans: 我讨厌法语考试. 我的成绩肯定很低

speaker: Gray
text: Oh, cheer up! Perhaps we didn't do too badly. The guy next to me wrote his name at the top of the paper.
trans: 啊, 别灰心. 或许我们考得还不算太糟. 坐我旁边的那个人只在试卷上写了他的名字

speaker: Richard
text: Yes?
trans: 是吗

speaker: Gray
text: Then he sat there and looked at it for three hours! He didn't write a word!
trans: 然后他就坐在那儿, 对着试卷看了3个小时, 一个字也没写

speaker: The Boss
text: Where's Sandra, Bob? I want her.
trans: 鲍勃, 桑德拉在哪儿, 我要找她

speaker: Bob
text: Do you want to speak to her?
trans: 您要跟她谈话吗

speaker: The Boss
text: Yes, I do. I want her to come my office. Tell her to come at once.
trans: 是的, 我要她到我的办公室来, 叫她马上来

speaker: Sandra
text: Did you want to see me?
trans: 您找我吗

speaker: The Boss
text: Ah, yes, Sandra. How do you spell 'intelligent'? Can you tell me?
trans: 啊, 是的, 桑德拉. 'intelligent' 怎样拼写, 你能告诉我吗

speaker: Sandra
text: I-N-T-E-L-L-I-G-E-N-T
trans: I-N-T-E-L-L-I-G-E-N-T

speaker: The Boss
text: That's right. You've typed it with only 'L'. This letter's full of mistakes. I want you to type it again.
trans: 对的. 但你只打了一个'L', 这封信里错漏百出. 我要你重打一遍

speaker: Sandra
text: Yes, I'll do that. I'm sorry about that.
trans: 是, 我这就重打. 对此我感到很抱歉

speaker: The Boss
text: And here's a little present for you.
trans: 这里有一件小礼物送你

speaker: Sandra
text: What is it?
trans: 是什么

speaker: The Boss
text: It's a dictionary. I hope it'll help you.
trans: 是本词典. 我希望它能对你有所帮助

speaker: Assistant
text: Do you like this dress, madam?
trans: 夫人, 您喜欢这件衣服吗

speaker: Lady
text: I like the colour very much. It's a lovely dress. but it's too small for me.
trans: 我很喜欢这颜色, 这是件漂亮的衣服, 可是对我来说太小了

speaker: Assistant
text: What about this one? It's a lovely dress. It's very smart. Short skirts are in fashion now. Would you like to try it?
trans: 这件怎么样, 这是件漂亮的衣服, 它很时髦. 短裙现在很流行. 您要试一试吗

speaker: Lady
text: All right.
trans: 好吧

speaker: Lady
text: I'm afraid this green dress is too small for me as well. It's smaller than the blue one.
trans: 恐怕这件绿色的我穿着也太小了. 它比那件蓝色的还要小

speaker: Lady
text: I don't like the colour either. It doesn't suit me at all. I think the blue dress is prettier.
trans: 我也不喜欢这种颜色. 这颜色根本不适合我. 我认为那件蓝色的更漂亮些

speaker: Lady
text: Could you show another blue dress? I want a dress like that one, but it must be my size.
trans: 您能再给我看一件蓝色的吗. 我想要一件和那件一样的, 但必须是我的尺寸

speaker: Assistant
text: I'm afraid I haven't got a larger dress. This is the largest dress in the shop.
trans: 恐怕没有更大的了. 这是店里最大的一件

speaker: Charlotte
text: Shall I make some coffee, Jane?
trans: 我来煮点咖啡好吗, 简

speaker: Jane
text: That's a good idea, Charlotte.
trans: 这是个好主意, 夏洛特

speaker: Charlotte
text: It's ready. Do you want any milk?
trans: 咖啡好了, 你要放点牛奶吗

speaker: Jane
text: Just a little, please.
trans: 一点点就行

speaker: Charlotte
text: What about some sugar? Two teaspoonfuls?
trans: 加些糖怎么样, 两茶勺行吗

speaker: Jane
text: No, less than that. One and a half teaspoonfuls, please. That's enough for me.
trans: 不, 再少一点. 放一勺半对我来说足够了

speaker: Jane
text: That was very nice.
trans: 太好了

speaker: Charlotte
text: Would you like some more?
trans: 您还要再来点吗

speaker: Jane
text: Yes, please.
trans: 好的

speaker: Jane
text: I'd like a cigarette, too. May I have one?
trans: 我还想抽支烟, 可以给我一支吗

speaker: Charlotte
text: Of course. I think there are a few in that box.
trans: 当然可以. 我想那个盒子里有一些

speaker: Jane
text: I'm afraid it's empty.
trans: 恐怕盒子上空的

speaker: Charlotte
text: What a pity!
trans: 真遗憾

speaker: Jane
text: It doesn't matter.
trans: 没关系

speaker: Charlotte
text: Have a biscuit instead. Eat more and smoke less!
trans: 那就吃块饼干吧. 多吃点,少抽点

speaker: Jane
text: That's very good advice!
trans: 这真是个好建议

speaker: Mr. Frith
text: I like this television very much. How much does it cost?
trans: 我非常喜欢这台电视机. 请问它多少钱

speaker: Assistant
text: It's the most expensive model in the shop. It cost five hundred pounds.
trans: 这是店里最贵的型号. 它的售价是500英镑

speaker: Mr. Frith
text: That's too expensive for us. We can't afford all that money.
trans: 这对我们来说太贵了. 我们花不起那么多钱

speaker: Assistant
text: This model's less expensive than that one. It's only three hundred pounds. But, of course, it's not as good as the expensive one.
trans: 这款型号比刚才那种要便宜些. 它只要300英镑. 但是, 它自然不如贵的那款那样好

speaker: Mr. Frith
text: I don't like this model. The other model's more expensive, but it's worth the money.
trans: 我不喜欢这款型号. 刚才那款型号的价格是贵了一些, 但它确实值那么多钱

speaker: Mr. Frith
text: Can we buy it on instalments?
trans: 我们可以用分期付款的方式购买吗

speaker: Assistant
text: Of course. You can pay a deposit of thirty pounds, and then fourteen pounds a month for three years.
trans: 当然可以. 您可以先付30英镑定金, 然后每个月14英镑, 分3年付清

speaker: Mr. Frith
text: Do you like it, dear?
trans: 你喜欢吗, 亲爱的

speaker: Mrs. Frith
text: I certainly do, but I don't like the price. You always want the best, but we can't afford it. Sometimes you think you're a millionaire!
trans: 我当然喜欢, 但是我不喜欢这个价钱. 你总是要买最好的, 可我们买不起. 有时候你以为自己是个百万富翁

speaker: Mr. Frith
text: Millionaire don't buy things on instalments!
trans: 百万富翁是不会分期付款买东西的

speaker: Conductor
text: Fares, please.
trans: 请买票

speaker: Man
text: Trafalgar Square, please.
trans: 请给我一张到特拉法尔加广场的票

speaker: Conductor
text: I'm sorry, sir. I can't change a ten-pound note. Haven't you got any small change?
trans: 抱歉, 我找不开10英镑的钞票, 您没有零钱吗

speaker: Man
text: I've got no small change, I'm afraid.
trans: 我还真没有零钱

speaker: Conductor
text: I'll ask some of the passengers.
trans: 那我问问其他乘客

speaker: Conductor
text: Have you any small change, sir?
trans: 先生, 您有零钱吗

speaker: 1st Passenger
text: I'm sorry. I've got none.
trans: 抱歉, 我没有

speaker: 2nd Passenger
text: I haven't got any either.
trans: 我也没有

speaker: Conductor
text: Can you change this ten-pound note, madam?
trans: 夫人, 您能把这10英镑的钞票换开吗

speaker: 3rd Passenger
text: I'm afraid I can't.
trans: 恐怕不能

speaker: 4th Passenger
text: Neither can I.
trans: 我也不能

speaker: Conductor
text: I'm very sorry, sir. You must get off the bus. None of our passengers can change this note. They're all millionaires!
trans: 非常抱歉, 先生. 您必须下车了. 我们的乘客中没人能换开这张钞票. 他们都是百万富翁

speaker: Tramps
text: Except us.
trans: 我们俩除外

speaker: 1st Tramp
text: I've got some small change.
trans: 我有零钱

speaker: 2nd Tramp
text: So have I.
trans: 我也有

speaker: Helen
text: Isn't there anyone at home?
trans: 家里没人吗

speaker: Jim
text: I'll knock again, Helen. Everything's very quite. I'm sure there's no one at home.
trans: 海伦, 我再敲一次. 毫无动静, 我敢肯定家里没有人

speaker: Helen
text: But that's impossible. Carol and Tom invited us to lunch. Look through the window.
trans: 但是这不可能. 卡罗尔和汤姆请我们来吃午饭的. 透过窗户看看

speaker: Helen
text: Can you see anything?
trans: 你能看见什么吗

speaker: Jim
text: Nothing at all.
trans: 啥都没看到

speaker: Helen
text: Let's try the back door.
trans: 让我们到后门去试试

speaker: Jim
text: Look! Everyone's in the garden.
trans: 看, 大伙都在花园里

speaker: Carol
text: Hello, Helen. Hello, Jim.
trans: 你好, 海伦. 你好, 吉姆

speaker: Tom
text: Everybody wants to have lunch in the garden. It's nice and warm out here.
trans: 大伙都想在花园里吃午饭. 这外面挺暖和的

speaker: Carol
text: Come and have something to drink.
trans: 来喝点什么吧

speaker: Jim
text: Thanks, Carol. May I have a glass of beer please?
trans: 谢谢, 卡罗尔. 给我一杯啤酒好吗

speaker: Carol
text: Beer? There's none left. You can have some lemonade.
trans: 啤酒? 已经一点都不剩了. 你可以喝点柠檬水

speaker: Jim
text: Lemonade!
trans: 柠檬水!

speaker: Tom
text: Don't believe her, Jim. She's only joking. Have some beer!
trans: 吉姆, 别信她的鬼话. 她只是在开玩笑. 来喝点啤酒吧

text: When my husband was going into the dining room this morning, he dropped some coins on the floor.
trans: 今天早上我丈夫走进饭厅时, 把一些硬币掉在地上了

text: There were coins everywhere. We looked for them, but we could not find them all.
trans: 到处都是硬币. 我们虽然找了, 但没能把它们全部找到

text: While we were having breakfast, out little boy, Tommy, found two small coins on the floor.
trans: 正当我们吃早饭时, 我们的儿子小汤米在地上找到了两枚小硬币

text: He put them both into his mouth. We both tried to get the coins, but it was too late. Tommy had already swallowed them!
trans: 他把这两枚硬币都放进了嘴里. 我们俩都试图把这两枚硬币弄出来, 但太迟了. 汤米已经把硬币吞了下去

text: Later that morning, when I was doing the housework, my husband phoned me from the office.
trans: 那天上午的晚些时候, 当我正做家务时, 我丈夫从办公室打来电话

text: 'How's Tommy?' he asked.
trans: '汤米怎么样', 他问道

text: 'I don't know,' I answered, 'Tommy's been to the toilet three times this morning, but I haven't had any change yet!'
trans: '我不知道', 我回答说. '今天上午汤米已经去了三次厕所, 但我还是没有看到硬币'

text: Do you like stories?
trans: 你喜欢听故事吗

text: I want to tell you a true story. It happened to a friend of mine a year ago.
trans: 我要告诉你一个真实的故事. 这是一年前发生在我朋友身上的故事

text: While my friend, George, was reading in bed, two thieves climbed into his kitchen.
trans: 当我的朋友乔治在床上看书时, 两个小偷爬进了他的厨房

text: After they had entered the house, they went into the dining room. It was very dark, so they turned on a torch.
trans: 他们进到屋里后, 走进了饭厅. 饭厅里很暗, 于是他们打开了手电筒

text: Suddenly, they heard a voice behind them.
trans: 突然, 他们听到身后有声音

text: 'What's up? What's up?' someone called.
trans: '什么事? 什么事?' 有人叫着

text: The thieves dropped the torch and ran away as quickly as they could.
trans: 小偷扔下了手电筒, 飞快地逃走了

text: George heard the noise and came downstairs quickly.
trans: 乔治听到了声响后, 迅速地下了楼

text: He turned on the light, but he couldn't see anyone. The thieves had already gone.
trans: 他打开灯, 但没看到一个人. 小偷逃走了

text: But George's parrot, Henry, was still there.
trans: 但是乔治的鹦鹉亨利仍在那里

text: 'What's up, George?' he called.
trans: '什么事, 乔治?' 它叫着

text: 'Nothing, Henry,' George said and smiled. 'Go back to sleep.'
trans: '没事, 亨利' 乔治笑着说, '接着睡觉吧'

speaker: Customer
text: I bought two expensive dictionaries here half an hour ago, but I forgot to take them with me.
trans: 半小时前我在这里买了两本很贵的词典, 但是我忘了带走

speaker: Manager
text: Who served you, sir?
trans: 是谁接待您的, 先生

speaker: Customer
text: The lady who is standing behind the counter.
trans: 站在柜台后面的的那位女士

speaker: Manager
text: Which books did you buy?
trans: 您买的是两本什么书

speaker: Customer
text: The books which are on the counter.
trans: 就是柜台上的那两本

speaker: Manager
text: Did you serve this gentleman half an hour ago, Caroline? He says he's the man who bought these books.
trans: 卡罗琳, 半小时前你接待过这位先生吗. 他说他就是买这两本书的人

speaker: Caroline
text: I can't remember. The man who I served was wearing a hat.
trans: 我记不起来了. 我接待的那个人戴着一顶帽子

speaker: Manager
text: Have you got a hat, sir?
trans: 先生, 您有帽子吗

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I have.
trans: 有的

speaker: Manager
text: Would you put it on, please?
trans: 能请您把帽子戴上吗

speaker: Customer
text: All right.
trans: 好的

speaker: Manager
text: Is this the man that you served, Caroline?
trans: 卡罗琳, 这是你接待过的那个人吗

speaker: Caroline
text: Yes. I recognize him now.
trans: 是他, 我现在认出他来了

speaker: Mike
text: Look, Scott. This is a photograph I took during my trip to Australia.
trans: 看, 这是我在澳大利亚旅行时拍的一张照片

speaker: Scott
text: Let me see it, Mike.
trans: 让我看看, 迈克

speaker: Scott
text: This is a good photograph. Who are these people?
trans: 这是一张很好的照片. 这些人是谁

speaker: Mike
text: They're people I met during the trip.
trans: 他们是我旅行时认识的人

speaker: Mike
text: That's the ship we travelled on.
trans: 这是我们所乘的那艘船

speaker: Scott
text: What a beautiful ship!
trans: 多漂亮的船啊

speaker: Scott
text: Who's this?
trans: 这是谁

speaker: Mike
text: That's the man I told you about. Remember?
trans: 这就是我跟你说过的那个人. 还记得吗

speaker: Scott
text: Ah yes. The one who offered you a job in Australia.
trans: 啊, 记得. 就是在澳大利亚给你工作的那个人

speaker: Mike
text: That's right.
trans: 没错

speaker: Scott
text: Who's this?
trans: 这是谁

speaker: Mike
text: Guess!
trans: 你猜猜

speaker: Scott
text: It's not you, is it?
trans: 这不是你吧, 对吗

speaker: Mike
text: That's right.
trans: 不, 是我

speaker: Mike
text: I grew a beard during the trip, but I shaved it off when I came home.
trans: 我在旅行时留了胡子, 但我回到家时就把它刮了

speaker: Scott
text: Why did you shave it off?
trans: 你为什么把它刮了

speaker: Mike
text: My wife didn't like it!
trans: 我妻子不喜欢

speaker: Susan
text: Can't you come in and have tea now, Peter?
trans: 彼得, 你现在能进来喝茶吗

speaker: Peter
text: Not yet. I must water the garden first.
trans: 还不能, 我得先给花园浇水

speaker: Susan
text: Do you have to water it now?
trans: 你非得现在浇吗

speaker: Peter
text: I'm afraid I must. Look at it! It's terribly dry.
trans: 我必须现在浇. 你看看, 干得厉害

speaker: Susan
text: What a nuisance!
trans: 真讨厌

speaker: Peter
text: Last summer it was very dry, too. Don't you remember? I had to water it every day.
trans: 去年夏天也是干得很. 你不记得了吗. 我不得不每天浇水

speaker: Susan
text: Well, I'll have tea by myself.
trans: 好吧, 那我自己喝茶了

speaker: Susan
text: That was quick! Have you finished already?
trans: 好快啊, 你这就浇完啦

speaker: Peter
text: Yes. Look out of the window.
trans: 是的, 你看看窗外

speaker: Susan
text: It's raining! That means you don't need to water the garden.
trans: 下雨了. 这就是说, 你不必给花园浇水了

speaker: Peter
text: That was a pleasant surprice. It means I can have tea, instead.
trans: 这是意想不到的好事. 这意味着我反倒可以喝茶了

speaker: Kate
text: Can you recognize that woman, Liz?
trans: 利兹, 你能认出那个女人吗

speaker: Liz
text: I think I can, Kate. It must be Karen Marsh, the actress.
trans: 我想我认得出来, 凯特. 那一定是女演员卡伦•马什

speaker: Kate
text: I thought so. Who's that beside her?
trans: 我也这样想. 她旁边的那个人是谁

speaker: Liz
text: That must be Conrad Reeves.
trans: 一定是康拉德•里弗斯

speaker: Kate
text: Conrad Reeves, the actor? It can't be.
trans: 康拉德•里弗斯, 那个男演员吗, 不可能

speaker: Kate
text: Let me have another look. I think you're right! Isn't he her third husband?
trans: 让我再看一看. 我想你是对的. 他不是她的第3任丈夫吗

speaker: Liz
text: No, He must be her fourth or fifth.
trans: 不, 他一定是她的第4任或第5任丈夫

speaker: Kate
text: Doesn't Karen Marsh look old!
trans: 卡伦看上去可够老的

speaker: Liz
text: She does, doesn't she! I read she's twenty-nine, but she must be at least forty.
trans: 是的, 谁说不是呢. 我从报上看到她是29岁, 但她一定至少有40岁了

speaker: Kate
text: I'm sure she is.
trans: 我肯定她有40岁了

speaker: Liz
text: She was a famous actress when I was still at school.
trans: 当我还是学生时, 她就是个著名的演员了

speaker: Kate
text: That was a long time ago, wasn't it?
trans: 那是好久以前的事了, 是吗

speaker: Liz
text: Not that long ago! I'm not more than twenty-nine myself.
trans: 不, 没那么久. 我自己都还没29岁呢

speaker: Ann
text: Look, Gary! That policeman's waving to you. He wants you to stop.
trans: 瞧, 加里. 那个警察正朝你挥手呢. 他要你停下来

speaker: Policeman
text: Where do you think you are? On a race track? You must have been driving at seventy miles an hour.
trans: 你认为你现在是在哪儿? 在赛车道上吗. 你刚才一定是以每小时70英里的速度开车

speaker: Gary
text: I can't have been.
trans: 我不会开得那样快的

speaker: Policeman
text: I was doing eighty when I overtook you.
trans: 我是以每小时80英里的速度赶上你的

speaker: Policeman
text: Didn't you see the speed limit?
trans: 难道你没看见限速牌吗

speaker: Gary
text: I'm afraid I didn't, officer. I must have been dreaming.
trans: 恐怕我没看见, 警官. 我一定是在梦游了

speaker: Ann
text: He wasn't dreaming, officer. I was telling him to drive slowly.
trans: 警官, 他没在梦游. 我刚才告诉过他开慢点的

speaker: Gary
text: That's why I didn't see the sign.
trans: 所有我才没看见那牌子

speaker: Policeman
text: Let me see your driving licence.
trans: 让我看一看你的驾照

speaker: Policeman
text: I won't charge you this time. But you'd better not to do it again!
trans: 这次我就不罚你款了. 但你最好不要再开得这样快

speaker: Gary
text: Thank you. I'll certainly be more careful.
trans: 谢谢您. 我以后一定会多加注意

speaker: Ann
text: I told you to drive slowly, Gary.
trans: 加里, 我刚才叫你开慢点

speaker: Gary
text: You always tell me to drive slowly, darling.
trans: 你总是叫我开慢点, 亲爱的

speaker: Ann
text: Well, next time you'd better take my advice!
trans: 好啦, 下次你最好还是听取我的劝告吧

speaker: Martin
text: Where are you going to spend your holidays this year, Gary?
trans: 加里, 今年你们打算去哪里度假

speaker: Gary
text: We may go abroad. I'm not sure. My wife wants to go to Egypt. I'd like to go there, too. We can't make up our minds.
trans: 我们可能到国外去, 但我不确定. 我妻子想到埃及去, 我也想去那儿. 我们还拿不定主意

speaker: Martin
text: Will you travel by sea or by air?
trans: 你们乘船去, 还是坐飞机去

speaker: Gary
text: We may travel by sea.
trans: 我们可能乘船去

speaker: Martin
text: It's cheaper, isn't it?
trans: 这更便宜些, 不是吗

speaker: Gary
text: It may be cheaper, but it takes a long time.
trans: 可能是便宜些, 但花的时间长

speaker: Martin
text: I'm sure you'll enjoy yourselves.
trans: 我敢肯定你们一定会玩得很开心

speaker: Gary
text: Don't be so sure. We might not go anywhere. My wife always worries too much.
trans: 别那么肯定啦. 我们可能哪里都去不成. 我妻子总是担心这担心那的

speaker: Gary
text: Who's going to look after the dog? Who's going to look after the house? Who's going to look after the garden?
trans: 谁来照顾狗啦, 谁来看管房子啦, 谁来照料花园啦

speaker: Gary
text: We have this problem every year. In the end, we stay at home and look after everything!
trans: 我们每年都碰到这类问题. 到头来, 我们呆在家里来照看一切

speaker: Reporter
text: Have you just made a new film, Miss Marsh?
trans: 您刚拍完一部新电影吗, 马什小姐

speaker: Miss Marsh
text: Yes, I have.
trans: 是的, 我刚拍完

speaker: Reporter
text: Are you going to make another?
trans: 您准备再拍一部吗

speaker: Miss Marsh
text: No, I'm not. I'm going to retire. I feel very tired. I don't want to make another film for a long time.
trans: 不, 我不准备拍了. 我打算退休了. 我感觉很累, 我早就不想再拍片子了

speaker: Kate
text: Let's buy a newspaper, Liz. Listen to this!
trans: 我们买份报纸吧, 莉兹. 你听这段

speaker: Kate
text: Karen Marsh: Sensational News! By our reporter, Alan Jones. Karen Marsh arrived at London Airport today. She was wearing a blue dress and a mink coat.
trans: 卡伦•马什: 爆炸性新闻. 由本报记者艾伦•琼斯报导. 卡伦•马什今天到达伦敦机场. 她穿着一身蓝色的裙子和一件貂皮大衣

speaker: Kate
text: She told me she had just made a new film. She said she was not going to make another. She said she was going to retire. She told reporters she felt very tired and didn't want to make another film for a long time.
trans: 她告诉我她刚拍完一部新片子. 她说她不准备再拍电影了. 她说她打算退休了. 她告诉记者她感到很疲劳, 早就不想再拍电影了

speaker: Liz
text: I wonder why!
trans: 我想知道为什么

speaker: Reporter
text: Are you really going to retire, Miss Marsh?
trans: 马什小姐, 您真的打算退休吗

speaker: Miss Marsh
text: I may. I can't make up my mind. I will have to ask my future husband. He won't let me make another film.
trans: 有可能, 我还拿不定主意. 我得问一下我的未婚夫. 他不想让我再拍电影了

speaker: Reporter
text: Your future husband, Miss Marsh?
trans: 你的未婚夫? 马什小姐

speaker: Miss Marsh
text: Yes, Let me introduce him to you. His name is Carlos. We're going to get married next week.
trans: 是的, 让我给你们介绍一下他. 他叫卡洛斯, 下个星期我们就要结婚了

speaker: Kate
text: Look, Liz! Here's another report about Karen Marsh.
trans: 看啊, 莉兹. 这又有一篇关于卡伦•马什的报导

speaker: Kate
text: Listen: Karen Marsh: The latest At her London Hotel today Miss Marsh told reporters she might retire. She said she couldn't make up her mind. She said she would have to ask her future husband. She said her future husband would not let her make another film. Then she introduce us to Carlos and told us they would get married next week.
trans: 你听, 卡伦•马什: 最新消息. 今天在伦敦酒店, 马什小姐告诉记者她可能要退休. 她说她还拿不定主意. 她说她得问问她的未婚夫. 她说她的未婚夫不会再让她拍电影. 然后她把他介绍给我们, 并告诉我们说他们下个星期结婚

speaker: Liz
text: That's sensational news, isn't it, Kate?
trans: 凯特, 这真是条轰动的消息, 是不是?

speaker: Kate
text: It certainly is. He'll be her sixth husband!
trans: 当然啦. 他将是她的第6任丈夫

speaker: Julie
text: Are you doing the football pools, Brian?
trans: 布莱恩, 你正在赌球吗

speaker: Brian
text: Yes, I've nearly finished, Julie. I'm sure we'll win something this week.
trans: 是的, 我马上就下好注了, 朱莉. 我敢肯定这个星期我们会赢一点什么

speaker: Julie
text: You always say that, but we never win anything! What will you do if you win a lot of money?
trans: 你老是那样说, 但是我们从来没赢过. 要是你赢了许多钱, 你打算做什么呢

speaker: Brian
text: If I win a lot of money I'll buy you a mink coat.
trans: 要是我赢了许多钱, 我会给你买件貂皮大衣

speaker: Julie
text: I don't want a mink coat! I want to see the world.
trans: 我不要貂皮大衣, 我要去见见世面

speaker: Brian
text: All right. If we win a lot of money we'll travel round the world and we'll stay at the best hotels. Then we'll return home and buy a big house in the country. We'll have a beautiful garden and ...
trans: 好吧. 要是我们赢了很多钱, 我们就去环游世界, 并且住最好的酒店. 然后我们回家, 在乡下买幢大房子. 我们将有一个漂亮的花园和...

speaker: Julie
text: But if we spend all that money we'll be poor again. What'll we do then?
trans: 但是如果我们把所有钱都花光了, 我们又会变穷的. 那时候我们该怎么办呢

speaker: Brian
text: If we spend all the money we'll try and win the football pools again.
trans: 如果我们花光了所有钱, 那我们就再赢一次赌球好了

speaker: Julie
text: It's pleasant dream but everything depends on 'if'.
trans: 这是个美好的梦, 但一切都取决于'如果'

speaker: Graham Turner
text: Is that you, John?
trans: 是你吗, 约翰

speaker: John Smith
text: Yes, speaking.
trans: 是我, 请讲

speaker: Graham Turner
text: Tell Mary we'll be late for dinner this evening
trans: 你告诉玛丽, 今晚吃饭我们将晚到一会儿

speaker: John Smith
text: I'm afraid I don't understand.
trans: 恐怕我不明白您的意思

speaker: Graham Turner
text: Hasn't Mary told you? She invited Charlotte and me to dinner this evening. I said I would be at your house at six o'clock, but the boss wants me to do some extra work. I'll have to stay at the office. I don't know when I'll finish. Oh, and by the way, my wife wants to know if Mary needs any help.
trans: 玛丽没有告诉你吗. 她邀请我和夏洛特今晚去吃饭. 我说过我6点到你家, 但是老板要我加班, 我不得不留在办公室, 不知道什么时候才能下班. 喔, 顺便问一句, 我妻子想知道玛丽是否需要帮忙

speaker: John Smith
text: I don't know what you're talking about.
trans: 我不知道您在说些什么

speaker: Graham Turner
text: That is John Smith, isn't it?
trans: 你是约翰•斯密斯, 对吗

speaker: John Smith
text: Yes, I'm John Smith.
trans: 是的, 我是约翰•斯密斯

speaker: Graham Turner
text: You are John Smith, the engineer, aren't you?
trans: 你是工程师约翰•斯密斯, 对吗

speaker: John Smith
text: That's right.
trans: 对

speaker: Graham Turner
text: You work for the Overseas Engineering Company, don't you?
trans: 你在海外工程公司上班, 是吗

speaker: John Smith
text: No, I don't. I'm John Smith the telephone engineer and I'm repairing your telephone line.
trans: 不, 不是. 我是电话工程师约翰•斯密斯, 我正在修理您的电话线

text: Last week, my four-year-old daughter, Sally, was invited to a children's party.
trans: 上周, 我4岁的女儿萨莉被邀请去参加一个儿童聚会

text: I decided to take her by train. Sally was very excited because she had never travelled on a train before.
trans: 我决定带她乘火车去. 萨莉非常激动, 因为她从未乘过火车

text: She sat near the window and asked questions about everything she saw.
trans: 她靠车窗坐着, 对她所看到的一切都要问个明白

text: Suddenly, a middle-aged lady got on the train and sat opposite Sally.
trans: 突然, 一个中年妇女上了火车, 坐在萨莉的对面

text: 'Hello, little girl,' she said.
trans: 你好, 小姑娘, 她说道

text: Sally did not answer, but looked at her curiously.
trans: 萨莉没有回应, 只是好奇的看着她

text: The lady was dressed in a blue coat and a large, funny hat.
trans: 那位妇女穿着一身蓝色的大衣, 戴着一顶大而滑稽的帽子

text: After the train had left the station, the lady opened her handbag and took out her powder compact. She then began to make up her face.
trans: 火车开出车站后, 那位妇女打开了她的手提包, 拿出了粉盒, 然后她开始打扮起来

text: Why are you doing that? Sally asked.
trans: 你为什么要那样做呢, 萨莉问道

text: To make myself beautiful, the lady answered. She put away her compact and smiled kindly.
trans: 为了把自己打扮漂亮啊, 那位妇女答道. 她放好了粉盒, 慈祥地微笑着

text: But you are still ugly, Sally said.
trans: 可是你仍然不好看啊, 萨莉说道

text: Sally was amused, but I was very embarrassed!
trans: 萨莉感到很有趣, 而我却十分尴尬

text: I live in a very old town which is surrounded by beautiful woods. It is a famous beauty spot.
trans: 我住在一个由美丽的树林环绕的古老小镇上. 这是一个著名的风景胜地

text: On Sundays, hundreds of people come from the city to see our town and to walk throught the woods.
trans: 每逢周日, 有许多的人从城里来参观我们的小镇, 并在树林中散步

text: Visitors have been asked to keep the woods clean and tidy. Litter baskets have been placed under the trees, but people still throw their rabbish everywhere.
trans: 游客已被告知要保持树林的整洁. 树下都已设置了废物筐, 但是人们仍然随地乱扔垃圾

text: Last Wednesday, I went for a walk in the woods. What I saw made me very sad.
trans: 上个星期三, 我到树林里去散步, 我所见到的一切使我非常难过

text: I counted seven old cars and three old refrigerators. The litter baskets were empty and the ground was covered with pieces of paper, cigarette ends, old tyres, empty bottles and rusty tins.
trans: 我数了一下, 有7辆旧汽车和3个旧冰箱. 废物筐上空的, 而满地都是废纸碎屑、烟头、旧轮胎、空瓶和生锈的空罐头

text: Among the rubbish, I found a sign which said, 'Anyone who leaves litter in these woods will be prosecuted!'
trans: 在垃圾堆中我发现了一块牌子, 上面写着: 凡是在此树林里丢弃垃圾者, 将依法处置
